detail_desc: Set with a smartphone case and matching headphone case and lanyard in imitation leather. Smartphone case with two credit card slots on the outside and a small D-ring at the base. Headphone case with a flap and carabiner hook at the top. Adjustable-length lanyard with a carabiner hook at the end.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details and sparkly stones. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Short, A-line skirt in washed denim with a zip fly and button, a coin pocket, front pockets, flap side pockets and a raw-edge hem. The cotton content of the skirt is partly recycled.
Short, V-neck dress in stretch jersey with long sleeves and a wrapover front with a tie detail at one side.
Classic T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Short, fitted dress in soft viscose jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front and long sleeves.
Baby Exclusive. Hat in fine-knit wool with ears on top and ties under the chin.
Set with a sleeveless top and shorts in a patterned weave. Flared top with gathers at the top and elastication around the neckline and armholes. Shorts with elastication at the waist and hems.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a boat neck and short, open sleeves with ties. Unlined.
Joggers in washed cotton denim with covered elastication at the waist, diagonal side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Short dress in sweatshirt fabric with pleats at the shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Gentle A-line to the hem. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Top in cotton jersey and a lace skirt. Top with a round neckline and short lace sleeves. Skirt with an elasticated waist and jersey lining.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Dress in a crinkled cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem with an embroidered pattern.

Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details with patches on the inside and an adjustable elasticated waist. Zip fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts. Jersey T-shirt with short slits in the sides. Cotton shorts with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.
Calf-length skirt in a rustle weave with a high, paper bag waist with an elasticated drawstring, large patch front pockets and a visible seam down the front and back. Unlined.
Top in soft pile with a drawstring hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.

Cropped blouse in an airy weave with a smocked bodice and frill-trimmed, square neckline. Long, wide sleeves with concealed elastication over the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs with a small frill trim.
Jacket in patterned, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with a detachable, lined jersey hood, small stand-up collar and quilted sections on the shoulders. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs. Faux shearling lining.
Jeans in washed superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and skinny legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, a regular waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

prod_name: Brenda Gift of the week pj
detail_desc: Pyjamas. Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a motif, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms in cotton flannel with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in cotton jersey with a yoke front and back, short sleeves with print stripes and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Chiffon playsuit with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with flared flounces at the cuffs.

Fully lined bikini top with laser-cut scalloped edges. The top has lightly padded cups with removable inserts, side support, a silicone trim at the top, detachable ties at the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Checked cotton flannel shirt with frayed cut-off sleeves, a turn-down collar, classic front and chest pocket. Yoke with a hanger at the back, and a rounded hem.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Wide blouse in a softly draping viscose weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in airy, softly draping jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved jersey top decorated with plastic sparkly stones.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.

Calf-length dungaree dress in washed cotton denim with a V-neck and adjustable shoulder straps. Wrapover front with diagonal buttons down the front and concealed buttons. Detachable belt with a metal buckle at the waist, side pockets and a slit at the front of the hem.
Vest top in soft, striped, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and trim in tone-on-tone woven fabric. Button placket, a small appliqué at the side and short slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft, printed cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with shaping seams. Elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch, front and back pockets, and ribbed hems.
Joggers in soft piqué made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems.
Short satin dressing gown with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Wrapover front with concealed ties at one side and a sewn-on tie belt at the waist.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Set of two different shades of wash-off nail polish. 2x5 ml. Easy to remove – no nail polish remover required.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fitted jumper in soft, fine-knit, ribbed cashmere with 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.

Calf-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and frill trims with overlocked edges at the top and pockets. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back with a button at the top, seam at the waist and straight legs.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved top in a cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Seam with ties at the front and flared sleeves with pleats at the cuffs.
Canvas sandals with fringes and a small platform. Jute espadrille-style soles with satin linings and rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Hooded top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a print motif on the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with appliqués, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a cotton and linen weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
Metal and plastic brooch in the shape of two interlinked rings. The zinc and acrylic content of the brooch are recycled.
Push-up triangle bikini top with frills at the front and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Short T-shirt dress in a viscose weave with a wide, round neckline, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist and concealed key pocket in the waistband. Unlined. The shorts are made partly from recycled polyester.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves.
Sleeveless lace dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a gathered seam and bows at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Metal chain necklace decorated with small, round discs. Adjustable length.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with long ties.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft slippers in velour with appliqués in the shape of a unicorn head at the front, wings at the sides and a faux fur tail. Anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Sleeveless top in a plumeti-weave viscose blend with a V-neck at the front and stand-up collar with a drawstring.
Cropped T-shirt in jersey with a print motif, a raw-edge V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

prod_name: COLAB TOCA BOCA LOW FUN TEE
detail_desc: TOCA LIFE x H&M. T-shirt in soft jersey with a partly glittery print on the front, ribbing around the neckline and a small fabric appliqué just above the hem.
5-pocket joggers in stretch, supersoft denim. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, a fake fly, low crotch and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Hairband with a braided imitation suede band, fabric flowers, and elastic at the back.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
